news.title: The 3 most environmentally damaging habits you might be able to change
news.summary: This article originally appeared on AlterNet. Homo sapiens means “wise person.” But considering our behaviors that are putting the Earth’s ecosystems at risk, we haven’t been very wise at all.

news.title: The 3 Most Environmentally Damaging Habits You Might Be Able to Change
news.summary: If going green seems complicated, here are a few key choices that can have a big impact on the planet we call home.

blogs.summary: If you’re truly interested in reducing your impact on the environment, you can...

author.name: EcoWatch: Cutting Edge Environmental News Service
author.description: We focus on the issues of water, air, food, energy and biodiversity, promoting the work of more than 1,000 grassroots environmental organizations and activists worldwide, and showcasing the insights of world-renowned environmental leaders.
